```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

```{r organize Dezfuli}
#Open dataset
Dezfuli <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Dezfuli.xls")
Dezfuli %<>% dplyr::select(1:15)

#Fish to Individual
Dezfuli %<>% dplyr::rename(Individual=FISH)

# change abreviations to full parasite names
Dezfuli %<>% rename("Pomphorhynchus laevis" = 8) %>% rename("Acanthocephalus clavula" = 9) %>% rename("Acanthocephalus anguillae" = 10) %>% rename("Acanthocephalus lucii" = 11) %>% rename("Echinorhynchus truttae" = 12) %>% rename("Neoechinorhynchus rutili" =13) %>% rename("Cyathocephalus truncatus" =14) %>% rename("Raphidascaris acus" = 15)

#Include Fish (host species) species
Dezfuli %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Salmo trutta", .before ="Individual")

#Seperate line lists by parasite name
  ## Pomphorhynchus laevis
Dezfuli2001a <- Dezfuli %>% select(1:8) 
Dezfuli2001a %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001a.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Acanthocephalus clavula
Dezfuli2001b <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8)) %>% select(-(9:14))
Dezfuli2001b %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001b.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Acanthocephalus anguillae
Dezfuli2001c <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:9)) %>% select(-(9:13)) 
Dezfuli2001c %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001c.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Acanthocephalus lucii
Dezfuli2001d <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:10)) %>% select(-(9:12)) 
Dezfuli2001d %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001d.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Echinorhynchus truttae
Dezfuli2001e <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:11)) %>% select(-(9:11)) 
Dezfuli2001e %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001e.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Neoechinorhynchus rutili
Dezfuli2001f <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:12)) %>% select(-(9:10)) 
Dezfuli2001f %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001f.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Cyathocephalus truncatus
Dezfuli2001g <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:13)) %>% select(-(9)) 
Dezfuli2001g %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001g.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Raphidascaris acus
Dezfuli2001h <- Dezfuli %>% select(-(8:14))
Dezfuli2001h %>% rename("Count" = 8) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dezfuli2001h.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r organize Dittmer1 and Dittmer 2}
#Open datasets
Dittmer1 <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Dittmer1.xls")
Dittmer2 <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Dittmer2.xls")

#Gender to sex
Dittmer1 %<>% dplyr::rename(Sex=Gender)
Dittmer2 %<>% dplyr::rename(Sex=Gender)

#Accurid
Dittmer1 %<>% dplyr::rename("Acuariid"="Acuariid Nematode (No)")
Dittmer2 %<>% dplyr::rename("Acuariid"="Acuariid Nematode (No)")

#Remove columns - information can be found in master data sheet
Dittmer1  %<>% select(-(2:4))
Dittmer2  %<>% select(-(2:4))

#Include Fish (host species) species
Dittmer1 %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Macrophthalmus hirtipes", .before ="Individual")
Dittmer2 %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Hemigrapsus crenulatus", .before ="Individual")

#Seperate line lists by host species - parasite name

  ## Macrophthalmus hirtipes - Profilicollis novaezelandensis
Dittmer2011a <- Dittmer1 %>% select(1:4) 
Dittmer2011a %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011a.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Macrophthalmus hirtipes - Maritrema novaezealandensis
Dittmer2011b <- Dittmer1 %>% select(-(4)) %>% select(-(5)) 
Dittmer2011b %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011b.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Macrophthalmus hirtipes - Acuariid Nematode
Dittmer2011c <- Dittmer1 %>% select(-(4:5)) 
Dittmer2011c %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011c.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Hemigrapsus crenulatus - Profilicollis novaezelandensis
Dittmer2011d <- Dittmer2 %>% select(1:4) 
Dittmer2011d %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011d.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Hemigrapsus crenulatus - Maritrema novaezealandensis
Dittmer2011e <- Dittmer2 %>% select(-(4)) %>% select(-(5)) 
Dittmer2011e %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011e.csv", row.names = FALSE)
  
## Hemigrapsus crenulatus - Acuariid Nematode
Dittmer2011f <- Dittmer2 %>% select(-(4:5)) 
Dittmer2011f %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Dittmer2011f.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r organize Giari}
#Open dataset
Giari <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Giari et al.xls")

#Change to full parasite names
Giari %<>% rename("Anguillicoloides crassus" = 7) %>% rename("Contracaecum rudolphii" = 8) %>% rename("Deropristis inflata" = 9) %>% rename("Helicometra fasciata" = 10) %>% rename("Bucephalus anguillae" = 11) %>% rename("Lecithochrium musculus" = 12) %>% rename("Tetraphyllidea" =13) %>% rename("Proteocephalus macrocephalus" =14) %>% rename("Telosentis exiguus" = 15)

# Include Individual Column
Giari %<>% add_column(Individual=NA, .before = "Sampling date") %>% mutate(Individual = 1:n())

#Remove irrelevant columns
Giari  %<>% select(-(3:4))

#Include host species
Giari %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Anguilla anguilla", .before ="Individual")

#Seperate line lists by parasite name
  ## Anguillicoloides crassus
Giari2020a <- Giari %>% select(1:6)
Giari2020a %>% rename("Count" = 6) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Giari2020a.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  ## Contracaecum rudolphii
Giari2020b <- Giari %>% select(-(6)) %>% select(-(7:13)) 
Giari2020b %>% rename("Count" = 6) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Giari2020b.csv", row.names = FALSE)

 ## Helicometra fasciata

Giari2020d %>% rename("Count" = 6) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Giari2020d.csv", row.names = FALSE)

 ## Bucephalus anguillae

Giari2020g %>% rename("Count" = 6) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Giari2020g.csv", row.names = FALSE)

 ## Proteocephalus macrocephalus
```

```{r organize Heaphy}
#Open dataset
Heaphy <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Heaphy.xlsx")

#Fix Headings
Heaphy %<>% rename(Sample=1) %>% rename(Individual=2) %>% rename(Sex=3) %>% rename("Size(mm)"=4) %>% rename("Plagiorhynchus allisonae"=8) %>% rename("Dilepididae sp."=9)

Heaphy %<>% select(-(5:7)) %>% slice(-1)

Heaphy %<>% relocate("Sample", .after = Individual)

#Include host species
Heaphy %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Transorchestis chiliensis", .before ="Individual")

#Seperate line lists by parasite name

 ## Plagiorhynchus allisonae
Heaphy2016a <- Heaphy %>% select(1:5)
Heaphy2016a %>% rename("Count" = 5) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Heaphy2016a.csv", row.names = FALSE)

 ## Dilepididae sp.
Heaphy2016b <- Heaphy %>% select(-(5)) 
Heaphy2016b %>% rename("Count" = 5) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Heaphy2016b.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r organize Peoples 1 and 2}
#Open datasets
Peoples2011a <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Peoples 1.xls")
Peoples2011b <- readxl::read_excel("Macroparasite datasets/Peoples 2.xls")

#Specimen # to Individual

Peoples2011b %<>% rename(Individual="Specimen # (as appears in notebook)")

#Include host species
Peoples2011a %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Heteromastus filiformis", .before ="Individual")
Peoples2011b %<>% add_column("Host Species" = "Abarenicola affinis", .before ="Individual")

#name parasite

Peoples2011b %<>% rename("Opecoelidae sp." = 5)

Peoples2011b %>% rename("Count" = 4) %>% write.csv(.,"Poulin Macroparasite Data/Peoples2011b.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r organize Ruehle 1-3}

Ruehle3 %<>% rename(Individual=FishID)
```
